body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install gcc@5.4.0
/tmp/berceanu/spack-stage/spack-stage-h_mzdde2/gcc-5.4.0/spack-build/./gcc/cc1: error while loading shared libraries: libisl.so.13: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
checking for suffix of object files... configure: error: in `/tmp/berceanu/spack-stage/spack-stageh_mzdde2/gcc-5.4.0/spack-build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/libgcc':
configure: error: cannot compute suffix of object files: cannot compile
```

### Platform and user environment

```commandline
$ uname -a 
Linux x470 4.15.0-33-generic #36-Ubuntu SMP Wed Aug 15 16:00:05 UTC 2018 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ lsb_release -d
Description:	Ubuntu 18.04.1 LTS
```
title: Installation issue: gcc@5.4.0
